```{r, echo = FALSE, results = "hide"}
m <- sample(30:100, 2)
vi <- sample(1:20, 1)

vf <- m[1] / (m[1] + m[2]) * vi
  
sc <- num_to_schoice(vf, delta = vf/10, format = FALSE)

sc$questions <- sprintf("$%g$ m/s", sc$questions)
```

Question
========
A skater of mass $`r m[1]`$ kg skates at speed $`r vi`$ m/s towards another skater of mass 
$`r m[2]`$ kg who is standing still with open arms. If the skaters hold on to each other after
they collide, with what speed do they both move off together?

```{r questionlist, echo = FALSE, results = "asis"}
answerlist(sc$questions, markup = "markdown")
```

Solution
========
Conservation of momentum gives

$$v' = \left(\frac{m_1}{m_1 + m_2} \right) v_1 = \left(\frac{`r m[1]`}{`r m[1]` + `r m[2]`} \right) (`r vi` \text{ m/s}) = `r fmt(vf,2)` \text{ m/s}$$
